page.title: 02CHANGING TIMES
page.content: Because of the oil industry there are many people moving into Midmar.These people have more money and more cars so shops have closed because people can drive into town and get a better selection of goods at lower prices.At one time there were very few people in the school but now the school has expanded.Twenty years ago the school was rebuilt.Four years ago the school was extended further.With the discovery of oil there came other changes.Lots of children came from far away and allhad different backgrounds, experiences and education.With the new children came new dialects replacing the old Doric accent but some people still speak that way.With changing times came new equipment mainly audio- visual like videos, computers, tape recorders and a listening centre.
